name: CyberSphere (theNfan)
description:
CyberSphere is a micro game where you have to push enemy spheres off the platform, or be pushed off yourself. 

There are power ups for bounce attacks, smash attacks and target seeking missiles as well as extra lives to give you a fighting change.

Controls:
Gamepad (recommended)
Keyboard: WASD / Cursor keys, CTLR and ESC or Pause to pause
